blog.name: dieqoharqreeves
blog.title: requests open
blog.description:
hello!! i’m abby :,)

i write mainly diego hargreeves and avengers, but if ive seen it ill probably write for ya

requests are open!! i do fluff, smut, and angst

my best are “would include”s

safe space!! im always here for you :,)

body:
dating peter parker would include…

- this is a lil more headcanon-y than the others haha oops

• pet names

- this boy has SO many pet names for you

- there’s gonna be a lot of “babyyyyyyy,” “princess,” and “angel”

- but he’ll call you anything and everything

- you call him “baby” and “babe” or whatever you’re in the mood for

- at this point y’all never really say each other’s names it’s just pet names but it’s adorable

• cuddling

- sweet angel boy is a cuddle monster

- all the time, you have dates that are just “please come over and hold me” or “please come over i want to hold you”

- he’s big spoon because he’s going to Protect and Hold the love of his life

- but sometimes if he’s had a rough day or something he’ll lay right on your chest and ask you to pet his hair

- he loves it when you pet his hair, especially if you’ve got long nails

- definitely moans when you gently scratch his scalp

- he has the warmth of a heater so he’s constantly burning up

- so he really doesn’t mind if your nose is cold and you kiss him or if your whole body is cold and you’re all snuggled up into him

- he feels the most at peace when he’s cradling you into his body and his nose was pressed into the back of your neck

• secrecy

- if you and peter try and stay a secret, it will NEVER work out

- that’s mostly because he can’t keep his hands off of you

- going out to eat at little mundane restaurants and he nudges your knee with his and shoots you puppy-dog eyes that convey “pppplease kiss me i wanna kiss you”

- getting caught kissing on the living room in the avengers compound

- tony probably placed a bet with steve that this would happen

- “my little babies… growing up too fast…” nat says

- clint probably fake cries

- one of the avengers cough cough Thor probably reveals it to the whole world without realizing he wants the two of you to be a secret

- completely shutting down the secrecy because hot damn peter can’t keep his hands off of you when you get all dressed up for parties

- “peter b parker get your hand off of my ass we’re at a formal party”

“but you knoooooooow what that dress does to meeeeee…”

• kisses

- not a lot of his kisses are serious because he cups your face with one hand and presses the other into your side which tickles

- he always smiles into kisses like a little dork

- he loves giving neck kisses because of how you instinctively tussle through his hair

- but his all time favorite kiss is when you wake up with his arms around you and you’re all drowsy and he’s looking down with absolute heart eyes times a thousand and you reach up and give him a super soft press to the lips and a gentle “good morning, my prince”

- your favorite kiss is when he’s gotten home from a mission and whether he’s hurt or not you pepper kisses all over his face to make him laugh before he grabs your face and puts his lips on yours

• miscellaneous

- wearing his super soft and warm and good smelling sweatshirts and shorts everywhere and him loving it

- probably having friendship bracelets

- he’s probably a terrible artist but still draws you during classes he doesn’t share with you

- he takes you out on little dates where he webs you guys up to tall buildings and you kiss and look at the sky

- Ned coming over and getting aggravated because Peter won’t stop making out with you

- teaching peter how to do hair, like braiding and ponytails and he loves it

- aunt may taking your side on everything

- geeking out about anything and everything together

- being absolute best friends no matter what

- but also loving each other no matter what :,)

summary: peter... peter you do know this is the 70s, right? this isnt facetime. she... she cant see you. speaking into the mask doesnt-...
body: peter… peter you do know this is the 70s, right? this isnt facetime. she… she cant see you. speaking into the mask doesnt- it doesnt give you a different voice. like yeah it muffles it a little bit but-

reblog.comment: peter… peter you do know this is the 70s, right? this isnt facetime. she… she cant see you. speaking into the mask doesnt- it doesnt give you a different voice. like yeah it muffles it a little bit but-

blog.name: spiderwebdudechild
blog.title: Spooderman
blog.description: I’m the real life trans Spider-Man that your anti vaxx parents warned you about

body:
Irondad (fam) and Spiderson headcanons

-Peter starts rubbing off on Tony and he films Peter whenever he’s excited (“looK MR STARK AT THE STUFF I BOUGHT FROM THE HOBBY STORE I GOT THESE MODEL KITS AND THIS ONE IS FOR US”)

-Pepper: “both of you are rubbing off on each other” “no we’re not” “oh really cause last night he snarked at Happy and you’ve learned what a GoPro is”

-Pepper joins in to make a video on Peter’s birthday for his surprise party, specifically to show that Tony didn’t know when to stop buying presents and they spent over a hundred dollars on wrapping paper

-Whenever there’s a new Spider-Man merch item released, Peter will buy and hide it in plain site to tease and get approval from Tony

-Rhodey finds a way to bring up the ferry incident into every argument (“It was an accident!” “Oh like the ferry?” / “My new laser works just fine! I made and tested it myself!” “Oh you gonna repair some boats with that laser, then?”)

-“Mr Stark, theoretically speaking, if I mixed in glitter with my web fluid how would you react?” “I give you an entire lab and this is how you thank me”

-Contrary to what they think would happen, Peter doesn’t get any less messy when he gets a huge open space for web making and tinkering. He hangs stuff from the ceiling, has a corner web hammock, there are greasy bottles and half mixed concoctions and whenever Peter is bored he hangs up sketched ideas for the most ridiculous web ideas. There’s also a growing pile of web refills although he forgets to take more than two extra with him on missions

-There are oddly specific rules, each instated due to a bad scenario that’s happened in the facility. Said rules inslude but are not limited to: No spider-hammocks in the kitchen, no drinks while mixing web fluid, no shaking hands with people wearing wool gloves, etc.

-Peter has to develop his own special pair of sunglasses due to being able to see into the ultraviolet light spectrum, and he reversed a pair so that Tony can sorta see what it looks like

-Rhodey freaks out the most, upon finding out that Peter has radioactive blood

-After May finds out about Peter, she goes to Tony as a precautionary thing and asks him to make sure Peter knows what he’s doing, so that he doesn’t jump into every situation headfirst

-He starts spending weekends at the facility, and due to that, Tony expands and adds a bunch of wall features to his bedroom, like a few nooks and ledges so that he can stay a comfortable little crawler

-It takes everybody bringing home fast food one time to realize that Peter eats three times as much as everybody else, and that groceries is a several-day preparation

-After two months of badgering from the public, Tony makes the facility the official address for fan mail and packages addressed to Spider-Man

-Occasionally, Tony will be caught up on something and trusts Peter to go out on a mission by himself. Peter stocks up on mid-battle selfies to send him for the post-victory report. He keeps them in an album called “Party Time”

-Peter makes social media accounts, and gets in trouble when he live-streams battles, because “that’s what causes heart attacks, Peter”

-When Tony finds out about the building falling on Peter in the fight with Vulture, it’s when it happened again but Peter caught it this time, and he made a deja vu remark. The context made Tony disappointed in himself for letting Peter be so vulnerable

-Peter has to develop his own special pair of sunglasses due to being able to see into the ultraviolet light spectrum, and he reversed a pair so that Tony can sorta see what it looks like

-Rhodey freaks out the most, upon finding out that Peter has radioactive blood

-After May finds out about Peter, she goes to Tony as a precautionary thing and asks him to make sure Peter knows what he’s doing, so that he doesn’t jump into every situation headfirst

-He starts spending weekends at the facility, and due to that, Tony expands and adds a bunch of wall features to his bedroom, like a few nooks and ledges so that he can stay a comfortable little crawler

-It takes everybody bringing home fast food one time to realize that Peter eats three times as much as everybody else, and that groceries is a several-day preparation

-After two months of badgering from the public, Tony makes the facility the official address for fan mail and packages addressed to Spider-Man

-Occasionally, Tony will be caught up on something and trusts Peter to go out on a mission by himself. Peter stocks up on mid-battle selfies to send him for the post-victory report. He keeps them in an album called “Party Time”

-Peter makes social media accounts, and gets in trouble when he live-streams battles, because “that’s what causes heart attacks, Peter”

-When Tony finds out about the building falling on Peter in the fight with Vulture, it’s when it happened again but Peter caught it this time, and he made a deja vu remark. The context made Tony disappointed in himself for letting Peter be so vulnerable

summary:
eeekk~ my first (official) edit on here! 
i looooove making edits but i don’t do it often. anyway, i made one for the Os. Like...
body:
eeekk~ my first (official) edit on here!

i looooove making edits but i don’t do it often. anyway, i made one for the Os. Like what it would be like to just stay in there house. You’ve got their cat ( @angerydj ‘s cat idea ), you’ve got them cuddling, alcohol, you know. you know…

enjoy! it sucks but don’t use w/o permission!!

apps used:

picsart

google/pinterest/tumblr/etc. (for pictures)

super impose

phonto (for watermark)

(below is what i bopped to while making it!)

summary: Peter Parker & Felicia Hardy in Paris for a week, on their honeymoon. And at some time at night, when the moon is up, they share...
body:
A great fanfic idea

Peter Parker & Felicia Hardy in Paris for a week, on their honeymoon. And at some time at night, when the moon is up, they share a kiss(close to the Effiel Tower..

Surprised no one has done a one shot fanfic of this. It be perfect❤️

summary: A new fic!! I actually got struck with inspiration late last night and I’ve been inspired ever since! I’ve never wrote fics...
body:
Feverish Affair - greengreed - Spider-Man (Ultimateverse) [Archive of Our Own]

A new fic!! I actually got struck with inspiration late last night and I’ve been inspired ever since! I’ve never wrote fics about the Ultimate Spider-Man comics, but now I’m starting. It’s one of my favorite universes. I thought I might as well write this. It’s a bit longer than my other fics, but it’s still a one shot. It would mean a lot to me if y’all read it! Enjoy!

Summary:

Turns out, Otto’s boss has been after him for some time. After a nighttime visit to his office, he realizes the married Osborn has a thing for him. Otto realizes, to his own horror, maybe he is attracted to his boss.

Words: 4671

summary:
i have been concocting a plan to get this mug for free
i see it every time i go to eb games and it’s the best thing i’ve ever...
body:
i have been concocting a plan to get this mug for free

i see it every time i go to eb games and it’s the best thing i’ve ever seen. however, my dad is CONVINCED i have a crush on mcu peter parker and i will NEVER hear the end of it if i buy it for myself. The solution? get him to buy it for me, without him knowing that i’m aware of the mug’s existence.

i am enlisting my brother in this stupid plan. i’m gonna tell him to take photos of it next time we’re at the mall, and get him to show them to our dad. i’m almost certain that he will get me the mug as a joke gift once he knows about it

anyways this is very dumb lmao, i’ll let y’all know if/when this works skdjdfjk
